comments:
I can't open .rptdesign files anymore.
I don't know which changes (in the configuration) make this happen but I get the following error:

Do you use a built BIRT　version or use the source code to built you own? What the changes you made on? on BIRT preference or source code?

we can't reproduce this issue.

Thanks
